EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.Reminder - Austin
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Austin.
Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow—Austin Thursday, June 30th, 2016 8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm – 1:00pm Lunch 1:00pm – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/austin?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pivotal-roadshow-2016-Austin]]>
Location VMware <[[https://www.vmware.com/]]> 6500 River Place Blvd. Bldg 6, 2nd floor Rudy's Conference Room Austin, TX 78730 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/VMware+Technology/@30.3959925,-97.8513729,390m/data=!3m1!1e3!4m13!1m7!3m6!1s0x865b338ce650b067:0xb19481ddb66b1031!2s6500+River+Pl+Blvd,+Austin,+TX+78730!3b1!8m2!3d30.3921728!4d-97.8488248!3m4!1s0x0000000000000000:0x5eca7f9f066a522e!8m2!3d30.3958224!4d-97.8516197]]> Free Parking located in the multi-story lot across from Bldg 6
Questions? Contact Peter Schmitt at pschmitt@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pschmitt@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you!
The Pivotal Team
